text: The 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 6 was a qualifying group for the 1990 FIFA World Cup. Spain and the Republic of Ireland were the two teams that qualified. ==Results== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Spain 8 6 1 1 20 3 +17 13 Republic of Ireland 8 5 2 1 10 2 +8 12 Hungary 8 2 4 2 8 12 –4 8 Northern Ireland 8 2 1 5 6 12 –6 5 Malta 8 0 2 6 3 18 –15 2 ==Top scorers== ===5 goals=== * Manolo * Míchel ===3 goals=== * Carmel Busuttil * Emilio Butragueño Category:1990 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA)
title: 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 6
